summary: Diff adds an invoice asset config and begins wiring the logo into InvoiceDetailPage, plus adds global CSS for an invoice watermark. However, the required static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated are not shown in the diff summary, and the actual application of the watermark container within InvoiceDetailPage is not verifiable from the truncated snippet. The diff also includes unrelated global theme color changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create invoice branding image assets from the uploaded image and add them as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (logo + watermark images committed).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references the assets by path but does not show any new image files added under frontend/public/assets/generated; only a TS config file is added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a faint watermark using the new watermark asset to the invoice detail viewâ€™s main invoice content area (line items + totals) behind text/controls, non-interactive, works in light/dark and print.
missing_requirements.reason: Global CSS for a watermark container is added, but the diff snippet for InvoiceDetailPage is truncated before showing whether the invoice content area is actually wrapped/applied with the required class and positioning.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme palette changes for light/dark mode (warm honey/amber variables) in index.css.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add invoice logo/watermark branding to existing invoice UI views; it does not request changing the app-wide theme variables.
